# Drone News 48h Brief — February 07, 2026

_Window: last 48 hours; 81 incidents._

## Summary
In the last 48 hours, various drone incidents have occurred, highlighting significant concerns surrounding unauthorized use, safety, and law enforcement. The FAA is tightening enforcement measures ahead of the Super Bowl, warning fans against flying drones in restricted areas. Meanwhile, in Sun Valley, multiple DUI arrests were made with the assistance of drones. In Moldova, authorities reported multiple discoveries of unauthorized drones near borders, raising cross-border security issues. Additionally, several Amazon delivery drones crashed, raising questions about safety regulations. Policymakers are discussing more stringent measures to combat illegal drone activities, especially when linked to smuggling and terrorism.

**By category:** airport: 11 • arrest: 10 • crash: 14 • other: 32 • security: 6 • smuggling: 6 • surveillance: 1 • terrorism: 1
**Top queries:** drone incident (22), drone arrest (16), unauthorized drone (15), drone crash (12), drone illegal (6)
